Control Name: 5.11.1 There's a clear guidance or requirement on what type of keys (PMK - Platform Managed Keys vs. CMK - Customer Managed Keys) should be used for this workload.
Control Statement: Different approaches can be used by the workload team. Decisions are often driven by security, compliance and specific data classification requirements. Understanding these requirements is important to determine which key types are best suitable (MMK - Microsoft-managed Keys, CMK - Customer-managed Keys or BYOK - Bring Your Own Key).

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.11 Are keys, secrets and certificates managed in a secure way?
